metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10191 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In versions of mruby up to and including 1.4.0, an integer overflow exists in src/vm.c::mrb_vm_exec() when handling OP_GETUPVAR in the presence of deep scope nesting, resulting in a use-after-free. An attacker that can cause Ruby code to be run can use this to possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: mruby package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
